import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const Slider = () => { const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const sliderContainers = document.querySelectorAll('.slider-container'); const slideWidth = sliderContainers[0]?.offsetWidth || 0; const moveSlider = () => { setCurrentSlide((prevSlide) => (prevSlide + 1) % sliderContainers.length); }; useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(moveSlider, 3000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); return (
); }; export default Slider;
